text:
Do you need to improve your use of modal
verbs in your daily conversations?

Are the differences between 'can you' and
'could you' and 'shall I' and 'should I'
Then join me in this lesson for a complete review of English modal verbs.

Hello and welcome everyone.
This is Minoo at Anglo-Link.

Today we are going to review all the
modal verbs. The main ones we'll be
If you have not studied these verbs before I recommend that you

first watch the three lessons in my
modal verbs series.
You will find the links in the description box below.
If you already have a relatively good grasp

of modal verbs and their basic uses, then
this lesson will help you to review and

consolidate your use of these verbs in
your daily conversations.
By the end of the lesson you will be a lot more confident in your

choice of modal verbs in different
situations.
So, when you're ready let's begin!
